testcase.name: Covid-19 Game Default user Creation
testcase.system-out: Given I Open the COVID19 GAME Application..................................passed When I click create warrior.................................................passed Then Default User is created and start your Journey button is displayed with Default warrior name guest.passed

testcase.name: Covid-19 Game User Creation
testcase.system-out: Given I Open the COVID19 GAME Application..................................passed When I Enter warrior name tes and click create warrior......................passed Then User is created and start your Journey button is displayed with warrior name tes.passed

testcase.name: User Journey of Successful Public Transport warrior battle field game and check the leadership board
testcase.system-out: Given I Open the COVID19 GAME Application..................................passed When I Enter warrior name tes and click create warrior......................passed Then start your Journey button is displayed and I click on the button to start the game.passed Then it routed to the Battle Field game Home page To Select the battle......passed When I click on the Public Transport Game...................................passed Then Public bus game start button is displayed and click on the button to start.passed When I click on the Safe option.............................................passed Then I can see the result...................................................passed When I click the final score button.........................................passed Then I will see the leadership board for the final score of warrior tes.....passed

testcase.name: User Journey of Successful Public place battle field game and check the leadership board
testcase.system-out: Given I Open the COVID19 GAME Application..................................passed When I Enter warrior name tes and click create warrior......................passed Then start your Journey button is displayed and I click on the button to start the game.passed Then it routed to the Battle Field game Home page To Select the battle......passed When I click on Go to a public place Game button............................passed Then seated at a Resturant game start button is displayed and click on the button to start the game.passed When I click on the Safe option for the the public place game...............passed Then I can see the result for the public place game.........................passed When I click the final score button to check the score after public place game.passed Then I will see the leadership board for the final score of warrior tes.....passed

testcase.name: Successful Work place battle field game Journey and check the leadership board
testcase.system-out: Given I Open the COVID19 GAME Application..................................passed When I Enter warrior name tes and click create warrior......................passed Then start your Journey button is displayed and I click on the button to start the game.passed Then it routed to the Battle Field game Home page To Select the battle......passed When I click on Go to the office Game button................................passed Then Working at home game start button is displayed and click on the button to start the game.passed When I click on the Safe option for the work place game.....................passed Then I can see the result for the work place game...........................passed When I click the final score button to check the score after work place game.passed Then I will see the leadership board for the final score of warrior tes.....passed

testcase.name: Timeout Journey of Warrior Game
testcase.system-out: Given I Open the COVID19 GAME Application..................................passed When I Enter warrior name tes and click create warrior......................passed Then start your Journey button is displayed and I click on the button to start the game.passed Then it routed to the Battle Field game Home page To Select the battle......passed When I click on Go to the office Game button................................passed Then Working at home game start button is displayed and click on the button to start the game.passed When I am not performing any Action for few Seconds.........................passed Then Timeout message is Displayed...........................................passed
